name: Galacticpest
description:
Welcome to Galaticpest! In this game inspired by classic space shooters such as Galaga and Space Invaders, you fight a horde of giant bugs from outer space.

Controls:

"A" and "D" to move the character

"S" to shoot

"SPACE" to pause the game

Thank you for playing this game, please, have a nice day.
